DataMode
DataMode

Used to get and set the Data Modes that are available on a Wireless Node.

DataMode
DataMode(
bool rawMode= true,
bool derivedMode= true
)

Creates a DataMode object.

Parameters
rawMode
bool

Whether raw mode should be enabled (true) or disabled (false). Defaults to true.

derivedMode
bool

Whether derived mode should be enabled (true) or disabled (false). Defaults to true.

rawModeEnabled
bool rawModeEnabled() const

Gets whether raw data mode is enabled or disabled in this object.

Returns

true if raw data mode is enabled in this object, false if it is disabled.

enableRawMode
void enableRawMode(
bool enable
)

Sets whether raw data mode is enabled or disabled in this object.

Parameters
enable
bool

Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) raw data mode in this object.

derivedModeEnabled
bool derivedModeEnabled() const

Gets whether derived data mode is enabled or disabled in this object.

Returns

true if derived data mode is enabled in this object, false if it is disabled.

enableDerivedMode
void enableDerivedMode(
bool enable
)

Sets whether derived data mode is enabled or disabled in this object.

Parameters
enable
bool

Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) derived data mode in this object.
